name: One Finger Death Punch 2
content:
files:
- mfplat_dll: https://lutris.net/files/tools/dll/mfplat/x64/mfplat.dll
game:
  appid: 1017530
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: mf
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win64
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X64.exe
    component: mediafoundation
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win64
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X64.exe
    component: mf_
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win64
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X64.exe
    component: mfreadwrite
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win64
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X64.exe
    component: wmadmod
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win64
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X64.exe
    component: wmvdecod
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: mfplat_dll
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
